MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG10 postcode area of Moffat. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to make repairs to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.55am on 16th November 2020.
